name: Cockatrice Strike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Gorgon's Fist, Medusa's Wrath, base attack bonus +14.

sections.text: As a full-round action, you can make a single unarmed strike against a dazed, flat-footed, paralyzed, staggered, stunned, or unconscious foe. If that attack is a critical hit, the target is petrified unless it succeeds on a Fortitude saving throw with a DC of 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier. This is a supernatural polymorph effect.
sections.name: Benefits

description: With a single strike, you transmute flesh to stone.
